document.full_text: actress angelina jolie said 3d animation drama "kung fu panda 2" was about finding your "inner peace," while co-star comic jack black pondered whether all life forms had "fleeting moments of existentiality."
document.title: jolie, black seek "inner peace" in kung fu panda 2
lines_and_colors: actress angelina jolie said 3d animation drama "kung fu panda 2" was about finding your "inner peace," while co-star comic jack black pondered whether all life forms had "fleeting moments of existentiality."
